漠䳭.definition: (bird species of China) desert wheatear (Oenanthe deserti)

漠不關心.definition: not the least bit concerned; completely indifferent

漠北.definition: Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)

漠南.definition: Inner Mongolia (lit. south of the Gobi Desert)

漠然置之.definition: to set to one side and ignore (idiom); quite indifferent; cold and uncaring

漠視.definition: to ignore; to neglect; to treat with contempt
